summary: A documentary about the rise of anti-Semitism in the USA after the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
cast: Kofi Annan|Joanne Baron|Shmuley Boteach|Michael L. Brown|James Carroll|Abraham Cooper|Father Coughlin|Eric Daniels|Scott DeCarlo|Mehdi Eliefifi|Henry Ford|Abraham Foxman|Hutton Gibson|Mel Gibson|Hadassah Gross|Ted Haggard|Alan Levin|Marc Levin|John MacArthur|Heidi Markenson|Mahathir Mohamad|Daniel Pearl|Richard Perle|Walid Rabah|Lou Reed|Shiya Ribowsky|George Lincoln Rockwell|Douglas Rushkoff|Mustafa Shak'a|Shaun Walker|Ben Wattenberg|Frank Weltner|Elie Wiesel|Mel Wruble|Lionel Ziprin
title: Protocols of Zion
